lessons.text: Purpose: Crypto research via Grok's real-time X/Twitter access
SIGNATURE_TYPE=1 must be kept (type 2 shows $0 balance - creds bound to type 1)
- Build the solution - not a patch, a PRODUCT. Infrastructure that makes forgetting impossible.

decisions.action: Stopped & disabled `fib-sniper.service` (was competing on same wallet)
`check_result()` always returned False (gamma API `winner` field is always None) - rewrote to use positions API with pagination + gamma fallback via `outcomePrices`
decisions.outcome: Added retry on "not enough balance/allowance" transient errors

relationships.insight: THE MISSION (most important thing Chartist ever said) - Agents everywhere forget their SOUL
